page.title: 09SCHOOL PLAYGROUND GAMES.1.
page.content: Katie Brown. One of the games I play in the playground is stuck in the mud.It is a bit lioke tig.One person is on while everyone else runs around trying to dodge the person who is on.If you get tug you have to stand with your feet apart like you are stuck in some mud until someone crawls through your legs to set you free. Another game we play is called Red Rover.There are two sides.Each side lines up holding hands facing the opposition then one group calls,'Red Rover sent someone right over' and the someone has to charge to the other side trying to break the link of hands.If they get through they can go back to ther own side but if they don't they have to join the winning side.Each team takes turns at this.
